name: Balls n' Stars 2
description:
Balls n' Stars 2 brings back the strategic physics platform puzzle hybrid with new features.

  • New and returning gimmicks to enhance or hinder your gameplay
  • A new aiming system, better optimized for controllers and even touchscreen
  • Rank medals will replace criteria stars from the first game for evaluating your performance in each stage
  • Impress Star Fairies throughout the archipelago through the new reputation system to make them visit your island
  • Achievements and challenges, making sure all your efforts matter
